text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion

Producer-san!
Welcome back!

Oh,
welcome back, Kaho.

You seem unusually cheerful today.
Did something good happen?

I played hero with everyone
from Houkura at the park!
Oh, everyone together...!

We were invited to the park for an important discussion!
I thought it was a strategy meeting, but...
It turned out to be a game of heroes!
How thoughtful of them...!
So, what roles did everyone play?
Juri-chan was the evil demon lord, Julie!

Rinze-san and Natsuha-san
were Julie's minions...
And Choco-senpai played the captured princess!
So, Juri's the demon lord!
Then, Kaho, you played the hero?
Yes!
Y-Yes!

Ha!
Take that!
That's how we saved Princess Choco!

I see...!
It must have been cool!

Yes!
Heroes are amazing and cool!

They're always strong, kind,
and make everyone smile!

Producer-san,
are you working today...?

Yeah,
I'm taking a break now and chatting with Kaho.

During your break...
You still have work...?
Yeah...

It feels like there are still some enemies left to defeat,
like in Kaho's hero game...

......!
Wow! Producer-san, you're amazing!

Am I?
I'm not really as amazing or cool as a hero...

You're amazing and cool!
Because you work so hard!!

I can be an idol because of you,
Producer-san!
No, it's not because of me.

I just give a little push to
Kaho's hard work.
Moreover...

That means, it wouldn't work with just me or just you,
Producer-san, right...?

Of course.
I can't be an idol!

I see...!
Producer-san, you're still amazing and cool!

If I'm with you, Producer-san,
I can work even harder!
To me, Producer-san-
is a hero!
